publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2545.1 Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Scottish Prison Serviceâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-2545) in the name of Roseanna Cunningham, leave out from "as the result of" to end and insert "and calls upon the Executive to publish the Estates Review, to end slopping out in Scottish prisons and to provide sufficient places in prison to accommodate the decisions of the courts."
